attributes.review: This app is terrible. I made the mistake of allowing notifications and the app completely spammed me. There’s literally no purpose in downloading this app! I hope this app gets removed soon, I see why there’s so many bad reviews.
attributes.title: Awful!!!!

attributes.review: of all my years of having an iphone, this is by far THE WORST app i have ever downloaded. i hate everything about this app, nobody should feel the absolute TORTURE of having this on their phone. should be removed immediately!!!!!
attributes.title: worst download EVER

attributes.review: Makes my phone glitch so much after I downloaded it and immediately deleted right after. Also terrible quality and it was very confusing.
attributes.title: Terrible App!

attributes.review: So, I rated this horrible app a 1 because I wanted to test the app out but when I opened the app it banned the app for me because I didn’t delete it after it told me they will deport me and hurt me and my family. They also broke my dog and my fish 🥺
attributes.title: racistt

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to get updates, but instead i got a terrible app that doesn’t work right that  glitches or crashes every time i try to use it i repeat do not download this app it will give you a headache
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and immediately got robbed. They stole my dignity and every ramen noodle in my kitchen. When I went to delete the app it punched me in the face and told me to get out of this country. Would not recommend to family or friends.
attributes.title: Horrible App

attributes.review: I can’t believe I downloaded an app where Donald J. Trump personally spits in my face and calls me obscenities. I give this app one star, and if I could, I’d give it less than that. He doesn’t deserve it if he’s spitting in people’s faces. ONE STAR!!1! 🤡😡🤬🤬🤬
attributes.title: Absolutely atrocious that they put this out

attributes.review: This app is horrible, it has multiple glitches and I don’t even have the app opened for that long. It also is very confusing, it will take you to different parts of the app at random times 🤦🏽‍♀️.
attributes.title: Trump’s 2020 app

attributes.review: I got the app so I could support my president Obama🤤🤤 but when I opened the app, I saw a big Cheeto. I would be lying if I said I wasn’t scared for my life. Every time I exit the app, I see Shane 🦄✨ÿåw standing outside my window. So yeah, this app deserves no stars, but that’s not an option.
attributes.title: Good💖🌈 just kidding✨🧚💕
